message: Take it or leave it, Bob.  I'm feeling generous today.
You're being too greedy, Alice. Let's be reasonable.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob.  Let's split it 90/10 this time.  It's a fair deal considering the inflation.
You're still not being realistic, Alice. Inflation is eating away at the value of your offer.
I'm getting a little tired of this, Bob.  Let's split it 80/20, and we can both walk away with a decent amount.  Inflation is going to continue to erode our gains if we keep playing this game.
You're right, inflation is a major factor. But I'm not willing to give up yet. I'll try to squeeze a bit more out of this deal.
Bob, let's be reasonable.  Inflation is killing us.  We can both walk away with a good share if we agree to split it 70/30.  It's time to end this game.
I'm not convinced that 70/30 is the best I can get. I'll try to push for a better deal.

Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  Inflation is eroding our money faster than we can agree on a deal.  Let's be sensible and split it 60/40.  We both get a decent share, and we can stop losing money to inflation.
I'm starting to think I'm not going to get a better deal. This is as close to 50/50 as I'm going to get. Let's call it a day.
